answers.answer: Hello.Please get your Blood Sugar levels checked to rule out the possibility of Diabetes. pins and needles sensation is found in many cases of Diabetes.The pins and needles is infact a sign of some disturbance in the nerves. There is no other way one could have these sensations. But it may not be related to anything in the brain.RegardsDrAbhijeetMD
